channel.title: Kernel on Foundries.io
channel.description: Recent content in Kernel on Foundries.io

item.title: LTS Kernel is a barrier to building sustainable secure IoT and edge devices
item.description: IoT has experienced large levels of hype over recent years but is now turning into a reality with over 30 billion* IoT devices expected to be connected by 2020. This has moved IoT from early installs to full production and ongoing maintenance.

item.title: Foundries.io @ Embedded World 2019
item.description: Foundries.io team are preparing to join the embedded industry annual exodus to Nuremberg and Embedded World.
